data.eml:eml: A new strikingly-colored species of the genus Galathea Fabricius, 1793 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Galatheidae) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Osawa, Masayuki (2015): A new strikingly-colored species of the genus Galathea Fabricius, 1793 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Galatheidae) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan. Zootaxa 4039 (4): 591-598, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4039.4.9
